name: Nabi
description:
This is a short puzzle game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 having the theme "An end is a new beginning".

Nabi is a simple puzzle game where you set a number of commands to be followed by a small caterpillar looking to eat a leaf in order to have energy for metamorphosis. Every time the set of commands end it repeats itself, representing the cycle where the end is a new beginning.
